banner.heading: THE STAGE IS SET
banner.paragraph: Unleash The Pro Within You. Compete In Our Tournaments And Claim Their Prizes!

feature_tournament.heading: Featured Tournaments
feature_tournament.sub_heading: Join our ongoing tournaments: compete and carve your name as one of the game's legends!

about_us.heading: Who we are
about_us.description: Fanzaty is a passion turned into reality, a dream come true. It's a dream of a place that embraces all lovers and fanatics of the game. The childhood obsession, the cheers of enthusiasts, all gather here. At Fanzaty, we help you participate, compete, and win, transforming every fan into a professional gamer.

join_our_community.heading: Become a pro FC24 player with private lessons from world class coaches
join_our_community.description: At Fanzaty Academy, we're all about taking your skills to the next level. We unlock every game secret. Our coaches are absolute legends who share all the insider details. Don’t worry about your progress; with us, you’re in the best hands.

players.description: “Fanzaty is a passion turned into reality, a dream come true. It’s a dream of a place that embraces all lovers and fanatics of the game.”
“There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration in some form.”
“If you are going to use a passage of Lorem Ipsum, you need to be sure there isn't anything embarrassing hidden in the middle of text.”

joinUs.heading: Join us on all our platforms
joinUs.description: We're a family, a community, and a launchpad for champions. Join us, and together, let's paint the digital field with pride.

footer.description: GCC champions, unleash your FC 24 fury! Fanzaty ignites esports tournaments just for you. Dominate leaderboards, conquer rivals, claim glory. Casual or pro, every skill finds its challenge. Gear up, legends! Join the arena, rule the game.

signUp.heading: Sign up
signUp.minLengthField: {{field}} must be at least {{length}} characters long!
signUp.invalidEmail: The input is not a valid E-mail!
signUp.invalidPhoneNumber: Phone number must be between 10 and 15 digits!

forgot_password.heading: Forgot Password?
forgot_password.description: Enter your email for the verification process. We will send 4 digits code to your email.

update_password_form.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long

joinTournament.subHead: We’ll make tournament organizing as fun as playing in them
joinTournament.heading: ORGANIZE ESPORTS TOURNAMENTS WITH Fanzaty
joinTournament.termCondition: You hereby confirm that you’ve read and agreed to the terms of service for tournament organizers.

detailsTab.heading: ABOUT 5 FC 24 ULTIMATE TEAM WINTER TOURNAMENT
detailsTab.contactInfo: Please contact the tournament organizer on Discord for any questions or issues regarding gameplay, results, match schedules, Registration status, game ID, and more.
detailsTab.playingMode: Playing in EAFC 24 Ultimate Team mode The winner is determined from one match
detailsTab.playerDetail: The player's EA ID must match the ID in the tournament table: if it is wrong, you will be disqualified If an opponent disconnects in the middle of the game, create a new game and continue where the game left off (a screenshot of where the game left off must be provided)
detailsTab.officialDate: When a specific time is not agreed upon, the game will be played on the official date and time set by the organizers. Competitors communicate via the game only.
